item.title: Gifts
item.description:
What we want most of our wedding is to have our closest friends and family in the same room to celebrate this special day with us. We consider your presence to be a present. That said, if you would really like to get us something tangible, please donate to some charities that we support ourselves:

Karimu

Bay Area Mountain Rescue Unit
Melina is a volunteer with the Bay Area Mountain Rescue Unit, a volunteer wilderness search and rescue team specialized in helping lost or stranded people in difficult terrain, challenging weather, or high altitude. All of our funding for searches, training, supplies, and equipment come from donations and member contributions with some assistance from the San Mateo County Sheriff’s Emergency Services Bureau. Donate
